SAMRAI::algs::TimeRefinementIntegratorConnectorWidthRequestor

SAMRAI::algs::TimeRefinementIntegratorConnectorWidthRequestor Class Reference

Implementation of the strategy class hier::PatchHierarchy::ConnectorWidthRequestorStrategy to tell the hier::PatchHierarchy how wide TimeRefinementIntegrator needs Connectors between hierarchy levels to be. More...

Detailed Description

Implementation of the strategy class hier::PatchHierarchy::ConnectorWidthRequestorStrategy to tell the hier::PatchHierarchy how wide TimeRefinementIntegrator needs Connectors between hierarchy levels to be.

void SAMRAI::algs::TimeRefinementIntegratorConnectorWidthRequestor::computeRequiredConnectorWidths ( std::vector< hier::IntVector > &  self_connector_widths,
std::vector< hier::IntVector > &  fine_connector_widths,
const hier::PatchHierarchy &  patch_hierarchy 
) const

Compute Connector widths that this class requires in order to work properly on a given hierarchy.

Implements the pure virtual method hier::PatchHierarchy::ConnectorWidthRequestorStrategy::computeRequiredConnectorWidths()

Parameters:
[out] self_connector_widths Array of widths for Connectors from a level to itself.
[out] fine_connector_widths Array of widths for Connectors from a level to the next finer level.
[in] patch_hierarchy 

void SAMRAI::algs::TimeRefinementIntegratorConnectorWidthRequestor::setTagBuffer ( const std::vector< int > &  tag_buffer  ) 

Plan to specify enough Connector width to support the given tag buffer.

This is only used by the TimeRefinementIntegrator that owns this object.
